org.apache.flink.runtime.state

接口 Snapshotable<S extends StateObject>

  • 类型参数:
    S - Generic type of the state object that is created as handle to snapshots.
    所有已知子接口:
    OperatorStateBackend
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractKeyedStateBackend, DefaultOperatorStateBackend, HeapKeyedStateBackend, RocksDBKeyedStateBackend

    public interface Snapshotable<S extends StateObject>
    Interface for operators that can perform snapshots of their state.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void restore(java.util.Collection<S> state)
      Restores state that was previously snapshotted from the provided parameters.
      java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<S> snapshot(long checkpointId, long timestamp, CheckpointStreamFactory streamFactory, CheckpointOptions checkpointOptions)
      Operation that writes a snapshot into a stream that is provided by the given CheckpointStreamFactory and returns a @RunnableFuture that gives a state handle to the snapshot.

    • 方法详细资料

      • snapshot

        java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<S> snapshot(long checkpointId,
                                                long timestamp,
                                                CheckpointStreamFactory streamFactory,
                                                CheckpointOptions checkpointOptions)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        Operation that writes a snapshot into a stream that is provided by the given CheckpointStreamFactory and returns a @RunnableFuture that gives a state handle to the snapshot. It is up to the implementation if the operation is performed synchronous or asynchronous. In the later case, the returned Runnable must be executed first before obtaining the handle.
        参数:
        checkpointId - The ID of the checkpoint.
        timestamp - The timestamp of the checkpoint.
        streamFactory - The factory that we can use for writing our state to streams.
        checkpointOptions - Options for how to perform this checkpoint.
        返回:
        A runnable future that will yield a StateObject.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • restore

        void restore(java.util.Collection<S> state)
      throws java.lang.Exception
        Restores state that was previously snapshotted from the provided parameters. Typically the parameters are state handles from which the old state is read.
        参数:
        state - the old state to restore.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
